scripts.unix_build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../part2-notes/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../notes-backend
scripts.build:ui: @powershell $FName = 'build'; if (Test-Path $FName) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force $FName }; cd ../part2; npm run build; Copy-Item $FName -Destination ../part3 -Recurse; cd ../part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
